Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Reroute near Morgan/Harrison
ShortDescription: #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Morgan/Harrison, due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Morgan/Harrison, due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via Jackson,  Racine, Harrison, Jefferson, Jackson, and resume normal route.

Westbound buses will operate via Adams, Des Plaines, Harrison, Racine, Van Buren, and resume normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Sheridan/Fargo
ShortDescription: NB 147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Sheridan, Touhy, Clark and Rogers: due to, police activity near Sheridan/Fargo.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Sheridan, Touhy, Clark and Rogers: due to, police activity near Sheridan/Fargo.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
